## Objective
      
MeningiOMICS leverages publicly available data in an interactive web application to provide:

* A hub for collective analysis of meningioma data
* Statistically robust and easily interpretable graphs and analysis
* A platform for integration of datasets not yet publicly available

*****       
  
## Get Started
        
Explore select publicly available meningioma datasets! Select a tab above to begin. Guide messages appear on screen to guide use, but more information may be found in the 'About' tab.
        
*****

## Functionality Overview
        
### Single Gene Analysis Tab
        
  * Analytical Functionality
      + Summary Statistics
      + ANOVA of omics by clinical variable
      + Tukeyâ€™s Honest Significant Difference (test of pairwise differences)
      + Correlation test of association
              
         
  * Visualization Functionality
      + Visualization of omics data by clinical variable boxplot/scatterplot
      + Pairwise gene correlation plots

### Multigene Analysis Tab
        
  * Analytical Functionality
      + Multigene ANOVA of omics data by categorical clinical variable
  * Visualization Functionality
      + Heatmap and hierarchical clustering of omics values
